name: Kitty's Adventure
description:
Visit Kitty's Adventure at Levi D. Smith Games

Kitty's Adventure is a game developed in remembrance of Kitty. Kitty is lost in the maze and only you can help her escape! Guide Kitty to the exit of each maze. Every level is a uniquely generated maze configuration. As you complete the levels with Kitty, the maze complexity increases.

Very popular with kids when demoed at Open Streets Knoxville, Makerpalooza, and Emory Place Block Party.  

Help Kitty escape the mazes

  • Buy costumes in the shop
  • Collect letters to earn coins to spend
  • Great for kids of all ages!
  • Each level is randomly generated for a new game every time
  • Bonus coins are given for collecting all letters
  • Try to finish each stage as quickly as possible
  • Mazes becomes more complex as you progress through the game
  • Gamepad or keyboard controls

Subscribe on YouTube | Follow on Twitter | Like on Facebook
